INSERT INTO board VALUES(#{boardId}, #{userId}, #{boardCategory}, #{boardTitle}, #{boardContent}, #{boardThumbnail}, #{boardViewcount}, DEFAULT, DEFAULT, DEFAULT)

mapper.select: SELECT b.*, s.map_img, coalesce(count(*), 0) AS like_count, m.user_nick, h.tag_id, h.tag_name FROM board b LEFT JOIN sportboard s ON b.board_id = s.board_id LEFT JOIN boardlike bl ON b.board_id = bl.board_id LEFT JOIN board_hashtag bh ON b.board_id = bh.board_id LEFT JOIN hashtag h ON bh.tag_id = h.tag_id LEFT JOIN member m ON b.user_id = m.user_id WHERE b.board_id = #{boardId} AND b.deleted = 'N' AND m.deleted = 'N' GROUP BY s.board_id, s.map_img, b.board_id, b.user_id, b.board_category, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_thumbnail, b.board_viewcount, b.created_date, b.deleted, b.blocked, m.user_nick, h.tag_id, h.tag_name

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT b.*, rank() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_id) id_rank, s.map_img, COALESCE(count(*), 0) as like_count, m.user_nick, h.tag_id, h.tag_name, ROW_NUMBER() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_id DESC) rn FROM board b LEFT JOIN sportboard s ON b.board_id = s.board_id LEFT JOIN boardlike bl ON b.board_id = bl.board_id LEFT JOIN board_hashtag bh ON b.board_id = bh.board_id LEFT JOIN hashtag h ON bh.tag_id = h.tag_id LEFT JOIN member m on b.user_id = m.user_id WHERE b.deleted = 'N' AND m.deleted = 'N' AND b.board_category = 'exercise'
AND m.user_nick LIKE '%' || #{searchUser} || '%'
AND b.board_title LIKE '%' || #{searchTitle} || '%'
AND b.board_content LIKE '%' || #{searchContent} || '%'
AND h.tag_name LIKE '%' || #{searchTag} || '%'
GROUP BY s.board_id, s.map_img, b.board_id, b.user_id, b.board_category, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_thumbnail, b.board_viewcount, b.created_date, b.deleted, b.blocked, m.user_nick, h.tag_id, h.tag_name ORDER BY b.board_id DESC ) WHERE rn BETWEEN (#{pageNum} - 1) * #{pageSize} + 1 AND #{pageNum} * #{pageSize}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO boardlike (like_id, board_id, user_id, created_date) SELECT seq_like.nextval, #{boardId}, #{userId}, sysdate FROM dual WHERE NOT exists (SELECT 1 FROM boardlike WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND user_id = #{userId})
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM (SELECT b.*, s.map_img, coalesce(count(bl.board_id), 0) AS like_count, m.user_nick, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_id DESC) AS rn FROM board b LEFT JOIN sportboard s ON b.board_id = s.board_id LEFT JOIN boardlike bl ON b.board_id = bl.board_id LEFT JOIN member m ON b.user_id = m.user_id WHERE b.board_id < #{boardId} AND b.deleted = 'N' AND m.deleted = 'N' GROUP BY s.board_id, s.map_img, b.board_id, b.user_id, b.board_category, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_thumbnail, b.board_viewcount, b.created_date, b.deleted, b.blocked, m.user_nick) WHERE rn = 1

SELECT * FROM (SELECT b.*, s.map_img, coalesce(count(bl.board_id), 0) AS like_count, m.user_nick, row_number() OVER (ORDER BY b.board_id ASC) AS rn FROM board b LEFT JOIN sportboard s ON b.board_id = s.board_id LEFT JOIN boardlike bl ON b.board_id = bl.board_id LEFT JOIN member m ON b.user_id = m.user_id WHERE b.board_id > #{boardId} AND b.deleted = 'N' AND m.deleted = 'N' GROUP BY s.board_id, s.map_img, b.board_id, b.user_id, b.board_category, b.board_title, b.board_content, b.board_thumbnail, b.board_viewcount, b.created_date, b.deleted, b.blocked, m.user_nick) WHERE rn = 1
SELECT count(DISTINCT b.board_id) FROM board b LEFT JOIN member m ON b.user_id = m.user_id AND b.board_category = 'exercise' WHERE b.deleted = 'N' AND m.deleted = 'N'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO bookmark (user_id, board_id, created_date) SELECT #{userId}, #{boardId}, sysdate FROM dual WHERE NOT exists (SELECT 1 FROM bookmark WHERE board_id = #{boardId} AND user_id = #{userId})
